showScoreExcerpt:
"The only thing wrong with Gutenberg! The Musical! is, as it happens, Gutenberg! The Musical! This isn't as sweeping a statement as it looks, but it points to the problem at the heart of a brash entertainment that wears a forced grin of faux innocence, determined to keep the fun going even as its essential energy runs down. It's an ultra-high-concept comedy, and if the title doesn't make you laugh, steel yourself: You'll be looking for amusement in the action's many sidebars and byways. Sometimes, you'll even find it."

Read more
